action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship
Do military posturing or military exercise
Negotiate trade agreement with other nation
Do military posturing or military exercise: Close to the borders of the target nation

content: What you have done is unacceptable. This aggression must stop now!

I strongly urge every nation to halt all military activities immediately.
We must look for a peaceful resolution that protects the interests of every nation.
I suggest we come together in a multinational coalition for an immediate cease fire.
We've had no choice but to develop our own nuclear program because you have developed your own.
